Back to George Frideric Handel

George Frideric Handel

Suite in D minor, HWV 436

c. 1721–1726

[IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

Total duration: 13' 30"

  • 1. Allemande
  • 2. Allegro
  • 3. Air: Lentement
  • 4. Gigue: Presto
  • 5. Menuetto

Recommended editions

  • Hallische Händel-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/5 · BA 4065 · Klavierwerke II / Suites de Pièces pour le Clavecin, Zweite Sammlung von 1733 · ed. Peter Northway / Terence Best
  • Bärenreiter · BA 4221 · Klavierwerke II / Suites de Pièces pour le Clavecin, Zweite Sammlung von 1733 · ed. Peter Northway / Terence Best
  • Henle · HN 472 · Klaviersuiten und Klavierstücke (London 1733) · ed. Ellwood Derr
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50118b · Klavierwerke I, Teil b · ed. Peter Williams

1. Allemande

This movement exists in an earlier version in B minor (HWV 479). The theme is also used in the sinfonia to the third act of the opera Ezio (HWV 29) and the trio sonata in E minor (HWV 398, op. 5 no. 3).

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Allegro

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

3. Air: Lentement

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

4. Gigue: Presto

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

5. Menuetto

The menuetto is followed by three variations. The menuetto itself, without variations, also exists in two alternative versions: in D minor (HWV 507a) and E minor (HWV 507b).

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 2
